action.action-desc: Mrs. Kirkpatrick of Arizona (for herself, Mr. Filner, Mr. Boozman, Mr. Teague, and Mr. Perriello) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reauthorize the Veterans’ Advisory Committee on Education.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans’ Advisory Committee on Education Reauthorization Act of 2009.

section.header: Reauthorization of Veterans’ Advisory Committee on Education
section.text: Section 3692(c) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2009 and inserting December 31, 2015.
